name: SINEWARE MANSHION SHOWCASE (DEMO)
description:
YOU'RE IN A ETERNAL HOUSE TOUR, WITH A NARRATOR THAT WILL STOP AT NOTHING FOR PERFECTION. WILL YOU GET OUT? OR WILL YOU ENJOY YOUR DAYS IN SATISFACTORY CONDITION?

THIS IS A DEMO, MEANING THE GAME AINT FINISHED YET HUN BUT IT WILL. WE GOTTA GO BACK TO SELLING HEROIN BEFORE THE STORM GETS CLACKY-TOOTHED. THE INDIE GAME SCENE IS FULL OF EITHER BORING COMING-OF-AGE RPGS ABOUT DEPRESSION OR GENDER DYSPHORIA OR SOMETHING OR ITS SOME HORROR GAME ABOUT EDUTAINMENT OR ANALOG HORROR. NO ONE WANTS TO MAKE SHIT ORIGINAL ANYMORE, BUT I WILL LIGHT THE SPARK THAT IS THE NEW INDIE GAME SCENE. ONE THAT IS ORIGINALITY.

LET MEKNOW WHAT YALL THINK BY CONTACTING ME ON THE SOCIAL MEDIA SITES BELOW:

WRITTEN, CODED, AND GRAPHIX BY CORREAN COLLAR
